title: Collaborative Authoring and Sharing Workshop for Problem-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design knowledge and understanding of PBL (Project-Based Learning) concepts
context.additional_context: Learners, as working professionals, have limited experience in developing and sharing educational materials and require collaboration tools in BYOD environments; the goal is to strengthen PBL design competencies in language education

learning_goals: Learners can utilize at least three PBL-based language education design templates
Learners can collaboratively create learning design documents with at least two peer teachers using collaboration tools
Learners can upload designed PBL scenarios to online platforms and share them with differentiated access permissions (read/edit)
Learners can revise their designs at least twice incorporating peer feedback when sharing designs
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
